sections.heading: RELATIONS BETWEEN THE PRINCIPALAND THE MANDATARYArt
sections.text: 3001. Mandatary's duty of performance; standard of careThe mandatary is bound to fulfill with prudence and diligence the mandate he has accepted. He is responsible to the principal for the loss that the principal sustains as a result of the mandat
